Body: Description: Hi team, We have Dns load balance for ISP link on our promises. Dns load balance url does not resolve on client server ip. Link :- dlp.bkt-tires.com

What We've Learned Updated: Customer encounter an issue with the IP of the EPP server .
They have a DNS load balancer that is not resolving the Server IP .
Next Steps Updated: Schedule a remote session.
Next Steps Updated: We will schedule a remote session to check the configuration.
